title: Ep 60 | Phil Is Under Water, Jase Gets Hypercompetitive & the Secret Key to Living a Life in Christ
description:
Phil's property is 95% flooded, and unlike most people, he couldn't be happier. Phil, Jase, and Al tackle a BIG listener question: How do I surrender to God? The guys discuss why we have a hard time surrendering, what happens when we surrender, what baptism is all about, and why even Jesus was baptized. Jase wraps it up with the secret key to living a life in Christ.
